actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to provide for the deportation from the United States of certain aliens who engage in demonstrations in support of acts of anti-American terrorism.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to deport an alien who engages in any public demonstration in support of actions aimed at U.S. diplomatic personnel or facilities, including the holding of persons as hostages.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the deportation from the United States of certain aliens who engage in demonstrations in support of acts of anti-American terrorism.
